sourcesContent:

Ltd.', status: 'PPA Stage', cecInputs: 'FSR/DPR/Supervision' }, // Testing and Commissioning { id: 65, name: 'Upper Khimti HEP', capacity: '12 MW', developer: 'Hamalaya Urja Bikas Company Ltd', status: 'Testing and Commissioning', cecInputs: 'FSR/UFSR/DPR' }, { id: 66, name: 'Upper Khimti-II HEP', capacity: '7.0 MW', developer: 'Hamalaya Urja Bikas Company Ltd', status: 'Testing and Commissioning', cecInputs: 'FSR/UFSR/DPR' }, ]; const statuses = ['all', 'Generation', 'Under Construction', 'PPA Stage', 'Testing and Commissioning']; const filteredProjects = selectedStatus === 'all' ? projects : projects.filter(p => p.status === selectedStatus); return (

Successful Projects

{/* Status Filter */}
{statuses.map(status => ( ))}
{/* Projects List */}
{filteredProjects.map(project => (

{project.name}

{project.capacity}

Developer: {project.developer}

Status: {project.status}

CEC Inputs: {project.cecInputs}

))}

Total Projects: {projects.length} | Showing: {filteredProjects.length}

); }; export default Projects;
